title: Can't start or participate in discyssiobs as my profile is lvl 4. While I'm summoner level 30..
body:
As said in title. I can't  even post this in the Boards Feedback thread, even though I'm summoner level 30.
My Boards profile page says I'm lvl 28. When trying to comment it says I'm at least below 6. Can't do anything but read and that's quite annoying.

What's up with that? Can this please be fixed?

replies.body: Your profile is showing as 30 currently, and may have just needed to sync up.  Is everything okay now?
